reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed with Martyn and Barbara for 6 nights at this comfortable friendly hotel during our transition to our new home. They were attentive and freindly without being obtrusive. The rooms in this ideally located hotel were clean, comfortable and spacious with everything one would need. The breakfast was again perfect in every way and nothing was too much trouble. We would highly recommend a stay here for a business trip or for a base for visiting the lovely countryside of Lincolnshire. Thanks to Martyn and Barbara our stressful period during our move was aleviated by the warm friendly welcome they afforded us.
reviews.title: Home from Home

reviews.text: We enjoyed a comfortable two night stay at this bed and breakfast "motel" in the village of North Kyme - handy for visiting south Lincolnshire and as a base for visiting Lincoln, if you don't mind the 20 mile trip. The owners were helpful and welcoming throughout our stay and ready to offer advice on where to visit and how to get around.
reviews.title: Warm welcome at the Old Coach House
